Stern School of Business        Robert F. Wagner Graduate School of Public Service        School of Continuing and Professional Studies        School of Law        School of Medicine        School of Social Work        Steinhardt School of Culture, Education, and Human Development        Tisch School of the Arts                                                   New York University              New York University              NYU Bookstores                                                    Bookstore       Computer Store       NYU Clothing & Gifts       Faculty Services         Textbooks         Buy Back       Compare Prices By Student ID       Compare Prices By Course ID       Search All Textbooks         Special Programs         Freshman Summer Reading       Liberal Studies       NYU Madrid       NYU Nursing Textbooks       NYU Steinhardt       NYU Nursing Sydney       NYU Tel Aviv       Medical Course Books       Medical Online Ordering                                 Search for a Book | View Book Bag                               Welcome NYU-Poly students! Finding your textbooks is easy! All you need are your catalog numbers, and we will provide you with a list of books required for your courses.      Step 1 -      Have your catalog numbers ready. Here are sample catalog numbers for Poly courses:      CS 5403 section 1328  CM 1014 section 1689  DM 6153 section 2322      *If your catalog number is only 3 digits, then add a "0" (zero) to the end of it.      Example CS.392 becomes CS.3920      Step 2 -      On our Home page, click on the link - "Textbook Inquiry and Ordering". This link will bring you to a page titled "Find a Book/Inquiry and Ordering"          Step 3 -   Once you're on the "Find a Book/Inquiry and Ordering" page, locate the heading "By Course".     Select the term "Fall 10 ". In the "Department" field enter your department initials, in the "Course ID" field, enter your four digit catalog number and in the "Section #" field, enter your four digit class number, then click on the "Go" button.   Example -       Step 4 -   This will provide you with a list of the course materials required for the course you have entered. You will need to repeat steps 1 -3 for each course you are taking. From this list you may choose to purchase your books online or shop at our store.       » Find Your Textbooks                        NYU Bookstore : 726 Broadway, New York, NY 10003 | (212) 998-4667

Finding your textbooks is easy! All you need are your catalog numbers, and we will provide you with a list of books required for your courses.      Step 1 -      Have your catalog numbers ready. Here are sample catalog numbers for Poly courses:      CS 5403 section 1328  CM 1014 section 1689  DM 6153 section 2322      *If your catalog number is only 3 digits, then add a "0" (zero) to the end of it.      Example CS.392 becomes CS.3920      Step 2 -      On our Home page, click on the link - "Textbook Inquiry and Ordering". This link will bring you to a page titled "Find a Book/Inquiry and Ordering"          Step 3 -   Once you're on the "Find a Book/Inquiry and Ordering" page, locate the heading "By Course".     Select the term "Fall 10 ". In the "Department" field enter your department initials, in the "Course ID" field, enter your four digit catalog number and in the "Section #" field, enter your four digit class number, then click on the "Go" button.   Example -       Step 4 -   This will provide you with a list of the course materials required for the course you have entered. You will need to repeat steps 1 -3 for each course you are taking. From this list you may choose to purchase your books online or shop at our store.       » Find Your Textbooks                        NYU Bookstore : 726 Broadway, New York, NY 10003 | (212) 998-4667

Starting at $499                                                                        726 Broadway, New York, NY 10003      (212) 998-4672, Fax (212) 995-3779 E-mail Us      The Computer Store offers the best selection of academically priced Hardware & Software: Apple, Lenovo, Dell, Epson and HP. We also carry computer accessories and ITP parts. We are an authorized Apple, Dell and Lenovo repair center. Save money with our inkjet cartridge refill service.                      Store Hours                   Monday - Friday       10am - 8pm                  Saturday & Sunday       11am - 6pm                                            *****************************                                                                                       Departmental purchases must be processed through iBuy .                                                Shop Online           The Computer Store offers a wide selection of hardware, software,      iPods, and accessories available for online purchasing!                  Academically Priced Software           NYU Students, Staff and Faculty get great deals      on popular software titles.                                     Dell Exclusive Savings           Exclusive savings on Dell desktops and notebooks. Now open to NYU alumni! »click here                         Apple Education Store           At the Apple Store for Education, you can configure a custom computer at educational prices.                                                           Trade in and Save!           Trade in your used, broken, or old electronic devices and earn savings towards a new purchase. For details »click here                     Inkjet Cartridge Refill Service           Save money while you help save the environment. Refill your inkjet cartridges here and save up to 60% on select HP, Epson, Canon, Dell and Lexmark inkjet cartridges. For a PDF price list »click here                                                                                      Computer Store : 242 Greene Street, New York, NY 10003 | (212) 998-44672

Departmental purchases must be processed through iBuy .                  NYU Medical Departments can use our online store.                              Finding Your Textbooks             Purchasing from the NYU Bookstore is a great choice for convenience, and a wide variety of competitively priced textbook choices, including new, used, rental and digital.                       Watch a video on textbook price comparison                                                 New! Self-Publishing             The Espresso Book Machine is a cutting-edge printing solution which, at the push of a button, prints, binds, and trims a bookstore-quality, paperback book from a digital file.       » Learn More               Student Employment Opportunities              The NYU Bookstore is currently hiring student employees for the fall semester. Qualified candidates should fill out the student application form and return it to the Bookstore.                     Student Application                                                 NYU Bookstore : 726 Broadway, New York, NY 10003 | (212) 998-4667

Wagner Graduate School of Public Service        School of Continuing and Professional Studies        School of Law        School of Medicine        School of Social Work        Steinhardt School of Culture, Education, and Human Development        Tisch School of the Arts                                                   New York University              New York University              NYU Bookstores                                                     Bookstore       Computer Store       NYU Clothing & Gifts       Faculty Services         Textbooks         Buy Back       Compare Prices By Student ID       Compare Prices By Course ID       Search All Textbooks       Special Programs                                                                       Drunk Tank Pink: And Other Unexpected Forces That Shape How We Think, Feel, and Behave     Adam Atler   Penguin Group, February 2014;  Paperback, 272pp; 9780143124931   $16.00                                                                   Search for a Book | View Book Bag                                                                           Compare Textbook Prices Online                 Price comparison is a new resource provided by the NYU Bookstore, which compares our selection with other leading online retailers with a single search. It's just another way we help you choose when it comes to course materials.                     Compare Textbook Prices by Student ID        Compare Textbook Prices by Course #                                                 Order Textbooks From NYU Bookstore                      Purchasing from the NYU Bookstore is a great choice for convenience, and a wide variety of competitively priced textbook choices, including new, used, rental and digital.       Get Your Personalized Coursebook List                                 Additional Textbook Resources                      Rent Textbooks In-store                  Instead of purchasing, you can now rent many of your textbooks both in-store or online. The bookstore is partnering with two of the largest book rental companies in the country to offer these services to NYU students.         Rent Textbooks Online         Textbooks thatare available for in-store rental will have a green sticker on the shelf tag. After selecting the textbooks you would like torent, you should proceed to the rental kiosks located opposite the cash registers. The rental kiosks require your NYU N-number, e-mail address and credit card for payment.     Click here to » Rent Your Textbooks Online and use the ISBN numbers you find in our Book Search function to see if a rental option is available. Online rentals are the most affordable way of acquiring books you do not intend to keep past the current semester.       Watch a video on in-store textbook rentals                                         Jumpbooks              We offer a select group of titles in digital formats that can be obtained on a subscription basis. eBooks powered by CourseSmart have the same content as print books, including page numbers for following assignments, have search functions to locate topics, work on a PC or MAC, and have highlight, note-taking and print tools. Most jumpbooks and CourseSmart eBooks are offered on a one semester subscription basis.                Course Smart eBooks                 You can purchase your jump eBook on-line with your traditional print books. Your jumpbook eBook will show up as a choice in your search results and will have a ".JB" after the ISBN number . Choose that version to get your jumpbook eBook and a key-code will be e-mailed to you by the next business day with instructions on how to activate it.             » Find Your Textbooks                                       Free e-Books           We have been invited to participate in a pilot program for delivery of digital books for colleges & universities. You can browse our selection of authors from Aristotle to Kafka to Wilde. The book downloads are free as is the readers software. Give it a shot and then give us some feedback.                  » Search Free Digital Books                                         NYU Bookstore : 726 Broadway, New York, NY 10003 | (212) 998-4667
